sect4.title: libtool
sect4.para: libtool provides generalized library-building support services.

sect4.title: libtoolize
sect4.para: libtoolize provides a standard way to add libtool support to a package.

sect4.title: libltdl
sect4.para: libltdl is a small library that aims at hiding from programmers the various difficulties of dlopening libraries.
